Articles.Content: i was just wondering if anyone knew if any progress had been made on implementing resources. all i know is that recourses are planned to be a big part of career mode, so it has to come before 1.0. also, wil resources be regenerating? or will they be finite? i would personally prefer slowly regenerating. of course, this is just my opinion.

nothing has been confirmed except for the fact that they at one point made the assets as well as a resource tree (which is ending up being refactored)

also, I'm no psychic, but there is no way that KSP will go through 69 more versions for a full release. Full release could be version 0.30 for all we know
